TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChangeMonitor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class ChangeMonitor Implements IDisposable
public ref class ChangeMonitor abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供衍生之自訂型別的基底類別，這個型別會監控快取項目所依存之資料的狀態變更。

span.span: Provides a base class for a derived custom type that monitors changes in the state of the data which a cache item depends on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別作為基底類別專門針對特定快取實作的衍生的監視類別。The class is used as the base class for derived monitor classes that are specialized for particular cache implementations. A執行個體監視的資料取決於快取項目狀態的變更。A instance monitors changes in the state of data which a cache item depends on. 例如，項目可以是檔案或資料實體，其內容會快取。For example, the item can be a file or data entity whose contents are cached. 如果更新的檔案或資料的實體，則必須也變更相關聯的快取項目。If the file or data entity is updated, the associated cache entry must be changed also. 您可以監視的一般項目包括資料實體 （例如資料庫欄位、 值、 資料列或資料表）、 另一個快取項目，以及檔案和檔案屬性。Common items that can be monitored include data entities (such as database fields, values, rows, or tables), another cache entry, and files and file attributes. 相依性變更為相依性的狀態變更。A dependency change is a change in the state of a dependency. 在典型的快取實作之後執行個體通知相依性已變更的快取，快取的執行所需的動作，例如使插入的快取項目失效。In a typical cache implementation, after a instance notifies the cache that a dependency has changed, the cache performs the required action, such as invalidating the inserted cache entry. 衍生可以自訂類別，以監視特定的不同資料中心的相依性變更。Derived classes can be customized to monitor dependency changes for specific different data stores. 比方說，是針對檔案系統、 實體記憶體或資料庫的快取實作。For example, there are cache implementations for a file system, physical memory, or a database. 類別檢查外部快取中，會發生的變更，並接著發出警示發生變更的快取。The class examines changes that occur outside the cache, and then alerts the cache that changes have occurred. [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]還包括下列類別衍生自類別：The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] includes the following classes that derive from class: - - - - 每個類別會搭配不同類型的相依性。Each of these classes works with different types of dependencies. 例如，衍生類別監視檔案系統資料 （檔案和資料夾） 的快取項目取決於快取的變更。For example, the derived class monitors changes to a cache for file system data (files and folders) that the cache item depends on.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

block.para:
如果您建立自訂快取實作或衍生的變更監視類型，您必須遵循特定的指導方針。
If you create a custom cache implementation or a derived change monitor type, you must follow certain guidelines.
下列清單摘要說明這些指導方針。
The following list summarizes these guidelines.
如需詳細資訊，請參閱個別方法或屬性的文件。
For more information, see the documentation for individual methods or properties.
- 在衍生類別的建構函式必須設定屬性，開始監視，並呼叫方法傳回之前的方法。The constructor of a derived class must set the property, begin monitoring, and call method before the method returns.如果建構函式在建構期間發生錯誤，而且必須具有要處置的資源，只能呼叫建構函式多載之後方法稱為因為多載會擲回如果初始化未完成的例外狀況。If a constructor encounters an error during constructions and must have to dispose of resources, the constructor can only call the overload after the method is called because the overload will throw an exception if initialization is not completed.
- 如果發生在變更完成初始化之前正在監視的資料，建構函式必須呼叫方法之前先呼叫方法。If changes occur in the data that is being monitored before initialization is complete, the constructor must call the method before calling the method.
- 在衍生之後型別會具現化，您必須插入自訂監視實作。After a derived type is instantiated, you must insert the monitor into a custom implementation.如果您不再使用變更監視器，請呼叫或方法。Or if you are finished using the change monitor, call the method.
- 之後執行個體插入至實作，執行個體所需變更監視器已處置。After a instance is inserted into a implementation, the instance require that the change monitor is disposed.即使插入無效，而且會導致例外狀況，實作必須呼叫多載。Even if the insertion is invalid and causes an exception, the implementation must call the overload.
- 衍生的變更監視器已插入快取之後,實作必須呼叫，藉由傳遞物件。After a derived change monitor is inserted into a cache, the implementation must call , by passing a object.方法可以呼叫一次。The method can be called only one time.如果已經發生相依性變更，會立即呼叫執行個體時呼叫。If a dependency change has already occurred, the instance will be called immediately when is called.否則，執行個體將會呼叫一次。Otherwise, the instance will be called only one time.此一次呼叫都會發生時方法稱為因為執行個體偵測到變更，或當上呼叫方法，何者先發生。This one time call occurs either when the method is called because the instance detected a change, or when the method is called on the , whichever occurs first.
- 所提供的執行個體實作應該移除相關聯的快取項目，並使用指定的原因列舉型別。The instance that is provided by an implementation should remove the associated cache entry and specify a reason by using the enumeration.
- A可以呼叫執行個體方法可能之前已呼叫快取實作方法或之後。A instance can call the method either before a cache implementation has called method or after.如果方法之前呼叫會呼叫基底實作將會通知發生這種情況的快取，而且將會觸發要傳遞給回呼時立即叫用。If the method is called before is called, the base implementation will notify the cache that this has occurred and will trigger the callback to be passed to immediately when is invoked.傳遞給任何狀態資料方法是變更監視所儲存，且後續傳遞給方法時叫用方法。Any state data that is passed to the method is saved by the change monitor and subsequently passed to the method when the method is invoked.
- 必須實作變更監視器方法。A change monitor must implement the method.如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法的文件。For more information, see the method documentation.
- 方法多載必須呼叫來處置執行個體。The method overload must be called to dispose of the instance.呼叫 Dispose 的規則如下所示：The rules for calling Dispose are as follows:
- 項目插入快取之前，必須負責處置的呼叫端的執行個體。Before an item is inserted into the cache, it is the responsibility of caller to dispose of a instance.
- 一次快取項目和與其相關聯的執行個體傳遞至快取，快取實作者必須確定，呼叫方法時，即使插入會失敗。Once cache item and the instances that are associated with it are passed to a cache, the cache implementer must make sure that that the method is called, even if the insert fails.
- 項目和其相關聯之後執行個體傳遞至快取中，呼叫端必須未處置的相依性，因為當方法呼叫，呼叫都會被視為相依性已變更。After an item and its associated instances are passed to a cache, the caller must not dispose the dependency because when the method is called, the call is treated as if the dependency has changed.如此一來，自動叫用方法。As a result, the method is automatically invoked.
- 這些規則納入考量，方法必須為下列方式之一：Taking these rules into consideration, the method must be called in one of the following ways:
- 使用者必須先呼叫方法多載，如果使用者覺得不將衍生的變更監視執行個體插入快取。Users must call the method overload if they decide not to insert the derived change-monitor instance into a cache.
- 如果實作會嘗試將變更監視執行個體物件快取插入，但插入失敗時，快取實作會負責呼叫多載。If the implementation tries to insert the change-monitor instance into an object cache but the insertion fails, the cache implementation is responsible for calling the overload.當插入嘗試造成例外狀況時，快取實作必須處置任何相關聯的相依性。When the insertion attempt causes an exception, the cache implementation must dispose of any associated dependencies.
- 如果移除快取項目，快取實作也必須處置相依性。If the cache entry is removed, the cache implementation must also dispose of the dependency.
- 內部實作方法會自動呼叫方法之後其所呼叫的回呼，註冊透過。The internal implementation of the method automatically calls the method after it calls a callback that is registered through .
這個自動呼叫 dispose 方法，在事件引發時，才會發生的初始化先前已完成執行個體。This automatic call to the dispose method during the event firing only occurs if the initialization of the instance was previously completed.當在衍生的變更監視器的建構函式呼叫方法，如果變更監視的狀態已變更 （亦即，當建構函式是仍在作用中時才會監視已變更的狀態） 則方法將自動處置變更監視器。When a derived change monitor's constructor calls the method, if the state of the change monitor has already changed (that is, the state that is monitored already changed when the constructor was still active) then the method will automatically dispose of the change monitor.
- 屬性設定為之後方法會呼叫衍生的變更監視執行個體，而不論是否物件已經設定了呼叫方法與否。The property is set to after the method is called by the derived change-monitor instance, regardless of whether a object has been set by a call to the method or not.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 這個建構函式由衍生類別中的建構函式呼叫，來初始化基底類別。

span.span: This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別有預設建構函式。The class has a default constructor. 不過，類別，繼承自基底類別，並定義自訂的變更監視行為必須於建構函式執行初始化。However, classes that inherit from the base class and define custom change-monitoring behavior must perform initialization in the constructor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱繼承者注意事項 > 一節的資訊。For more information, see the Notes for Inheritors section.

para.span: 在衍生類別的建構函式必須設定屬性，開始監視，並呼叫類別再傳回。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class must set the property, begin monitoring, and call the class before it returns.

para.span: 如果在初始化之前的相依性變更已完成 （例如，如果快取中找不到相依的快取索引鍵），建構函式必須呼叫方法之前呼叫方法。

span.span: If a dependency changes before initialization is complete (for example, if a dependent cache key is not found in the cache), the constructor must call the method before it calls the method.

para.span: 在此情況下，建構函式可以呼叫方法之後才呼叫方法，因為方法擲回例外狀況，初始化未完成。

span.span: In this case, constructor can call the method only after the method is called, because the method throws an exception if initialization is not completed.

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來釋放執行個體和相關的資源。The method is used to release the instance and related resources. 公用方法會叫用協調金鑰生命週期事件 （例如初始化） 衍生的變更監視器類別的處置處理程序，並釋放執行個體，讓執行個體進行記憶體回收。The public method is invoked to coordinate the disposal process with key life-cycle events of derived change-monitor classes (such as initialization), and to release the instance so that the instance can be garbage collected. 方法藉由衍生的變更監視器類別來處置 managed 和 unmanaged 資源。The method is implemented by derived change-monitor classes to dispose of their managed and unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 將 類別的目前執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會叫用衍生類別只一次，第一次呼叫的方法。The method invokes the method of derived classes only one time, the first time it is called. 後續呼叫方法沒有任何作用。Subsequent calls to the method have no effect. 在呼叫方法之後，屬性設定為`true`。After the method has been called, the property is set to `true`. 必須叫用多載來處置執行個體。The overload must be called to dispose of a instance. 呼叫 dispose 方法的規則如下：The following are the rules for calling the dispose method: - 項目插入快取之前，是呼叫者的責任處置執行個體。Before an item is inserted into the cache, it is the caller's responsibility to dispose of a instance. - 一次快取項目和與其相關聯的執行個體傳遞至快取中，必須確定快取實作者呼叫時，即使插入會失敗。Once cache item and the instances that are associated with it are passed to a cache, the cache implementer that must make sure that is called, even if the insert fails. - 項目和其相關聯之後執行個體傳遞至快取中，呼叫端必須未處置的相依性，因為當方法呼叫，呼叫都會被視為相依性已變更。After an item and its associated instances are passed to a cache, the caller must not dispose the dependency because when the method is called, the call is treated as if the dependency has changed. 如此一來，自動叫用方法。As a result, the method is automatically invoked. - 這些規則納入考量，方法必須為下列方式之一：Taking these rules into consideration, the method must be called in one of the following ways: - 使用者必須先呼叫方法多載，如果使用者覺得不將衍生的變更監視執行個體插入快取。Users must call the method overload if they decide not to insert the derived change-monitor instance into a cache. - 快取實作會負責呼叫多載，如果實作會嘗試將變更監視執行個體物件快取插入，但插入失敗。The cache implementation is responsible for calling the overload if the implementation tries to insert the change-monitor instance into an object cache but the insertion fails. 當插入嘗試造成例外狀況時，快取實作必須處置任何相關聯的相依性。When the insertion attempt causes an exception, the cache implementation must dispose any associated dependencies. - 如果移除快取項目，快取實作也必須處置相依性。If the cache entry is removed, the cache implementation must also dispose the dependency. 內部實作方法會自動呼叫方法之後其所呼叫的回呼，註冊透過方法。The internal implementation of the method automatically calls the method after it calls a callback that is registered through the method. > [!NOTE] > 此自動處置事件引發時，才會發生的初始化先前完成的執行個體。This automatic dispose during the event firing only occurs if the initialization of the instance previously completed. 當在衍生的變更監視器的建構函式呼叫方法，如果變更監視的狀態已變更 （也就是受到監視的狀態已變更時仍在作用中的建構函式） 然後方法將自動處置變更監視器。When a derived change monitor's constructor calls the method, if the state of the change monitor has already changed (that is, the state that is monitored has already changed when the constructor was still active) then method will automatically dispose the change monitor. > [!NOTE] > 使用者不應該呼叫方法。Users should not call the method. 不過，您無法阻止使用者呼叫方法。However, you cannot prevent users from calling the method. 因此，如果沒有的話，叫用方法。Therefore, if they do, the method is invoked. 在此情況下，如同相依性已變更，會收到通知的快取項目。In that case, the cache entry is notified as if the dependency has changed. 若要防止衍生的類別覆寫方法，此方法不是明確介面實作。To prevent derived classes from overriding method, the method is not an explicit interface implementation.

exception.span: 初始化沒有在呼叫基底 方法的衍生變更監視器類別中完成。

span.span: Initialization is not complete in the derived change-monitor class that called the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放所有的 Managed 資源、Unmanaged 資源以及對 執行個體的所有參考， 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources and any references to a instance; to release only unmanaged resources.

param.span: 傳遞 時， 執行緒會呼叫 方法，任何外部 Managed 參考都可能不再有效，因為記憶體回收已經將這些參考收回。

span.span: When is passed, the method is called by a thread and any external managed references are likely no longer valid because they have already been garbage collected.

summary.span: 釋放所有的 Managed 資源和 Unmanaged 資源，以及對 執行個體的所有參考。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources and any references to the instance.

summary.span: 這項多載必須由衍生自變更監控的類別實作。

span.span: This overload must be implemented by derived change-monitor classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當值`disposing`值是`true`處置所有的 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，以便衍生的變更監視執行個體進行記憶體回收，會釋放此物件的任何參考。When the value of `disposing` value is `true`, all managed and unmanaged resources are disposed and any references to this object are released so that the derived change-monitor instance can be garbage collected. 這樣會保證的基底方法會叫用實作方法一次。It is guaranteed that the base method will invoke the implemented method only one time.

para.span: 必須實作變更監視器釋放所有的多載 managed 和 unmanaged 資源時的值是。

span.span: A change monitor must implement the overload to release all managed and unmanaged resources when the value of is .

para.span: 具有方法多載值時，會呼叫一次，也就是第一次會處置的執行個體。

span.span: The method overload that has a value of is called only one time, namely, when the instance is disposed for the first time.

para.span: 變更監視器不能呼叫直接多載。

span.span: A change monitor must not call the overload directly.

para.span: 衍生的變更監視器可以呼叫公用無參數方法在基底類別。

span.span: A derived change monitor can call the public parameter-less method on the base class.

para.span: 或者，變更監視器可以實作完成項方法。

span.span: Alternatively, a change monitor can implement a finalizer method.

para.span: 在此情況下，可以叫用完成項方法並將它傳遞值。

span.span: In that case, the finalizer can invoke the method and pass it a value of .
However, this is usually unnecessary.

para.span: 維護變更監視執行個體參考的服務通常會執行監視的相依性變更。

span.span: Monitoring for dependency changes is typically performed by a service that maintains a reference to the change-monitor instance.

para.span: 參考由記憶體回收，避免執行個體，因此不需要的完成項方法。

span.span: The reference prevents the instance from being garbage collected, and therefore makes a finalizer method unnecessary.

para.span: 若要避免記憶體流失的相依性變更時， （除非初始設定尚未完成），方法會處置變更監視執行個體。

span.span: To avoid memory leaks, when a dependency changes, the method disposes the change-monitor instance (unless initialization has not finished).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChanged As Boolean
public: property bool HasChanged { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示 類別所監控的狀態已變更。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that the state that is monitored by the class has changed.

value.span: 如果 執行個體所監控的狀態已變更則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the state that is monitored by the instance has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以檢查這個屬性中衍生的值類別，以查看是否已變更相依性。You can check the value of this property in a derived class to see whether a dependency has changed. 值設定為`true`相依性變更發生時 (也就是當方法呼叫)。The value is set to `true` when a dependency change occurs (that is, when the method is called). 之後方法由衍生類別中的值呼叫屬性會是`true`，無論是否已通知執行個體的呼叫所方法。After the method is called by the derived class, the value of the property will be `true`, regardless of whether a instance has been notified by a call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫端可以檢查以查看是否已變更相依性屬性。Callers can check the property to see whether a dependency has changed. 不過，在多執行緒環境中，以更簡單且更容易維護的方法是將資料插入快取實作，而不會檢查屬性。However, in a multi-threaded environment, a simpler and more maintainable approach is to insert data into a cache implementation without checking the property. 快取實作必須檢查屬性，且必須不執行插入或設定作業，如果已經變更一個或多個相關聯的相依性。Cache implementations must check the property for you and must not perform an insert or set operation if one or more associated dependencies have already changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InitializationComplete() cil managed

summary.span: 從衍生類別的建構函式進行呼叫，以指出初始化已經完成。

span.span: Called from the constructor of derived classes to indicate that initialization is finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別的建構函式如果相依性變更衍生類別中完成初始化之前，必須叫用方法。If a dependency changes before initialization is complete in a derived class, the constructor of the derived class must invoke the method. 當叫用方法時，屬性會自動設定為`true`變更監視器。When the method is invoked, the property is automatically set to `true` by the change monitor. 如此一來，當變更監視器的建構函式呼叫自動呼叫方法時，基底類別將方法。As a result, when the change monitor's constructor calls the method, the base class will automatically call the method. 如果已完成，初始設定方法自動處置衍生的變更監視執行個體。If initialization is complete, the method automatically disposes the derived change-monitor instance.

para.span: 在衍生類別的建構函式必須呼叫基底建構函式傳回之前的方法。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class must call the base method before the constructor returns.

para.span: 在衍生類別的建構函式可以呼叫方法之後才呼叫，因為方法擲回例外狀況，初始化未完成。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class can call the method only after is called, because the method throws an exception if initialization is not completed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDisposed As Boolean
public: property bool IsDisposed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否已經處置 類別的衍生執行個體。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that the derived instance of a class is disposed.

value.span: 如果已經處置了執行個體，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the instance is disposed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`基底之後方法呼叫處置執行個體的衍生類別中的方法。The property is set to `true` after the base method calls the method in a derived class to dispose of the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void NotifyOnChanged(class System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback onChangedCallback) cil managed

param.name: onChangedCallback
param.span: 在相依性變更時叫用之方法的參考。

span.span: A reference to a method that is invoked when a dependency has changed.

summary.span: 在相依性變更時，由快取實作呼叫來註冊回呼，並透過 委派通知 執行個體。

span.span: Called by Cache implementers to register a callback and notify an instance through the delegate when a dependency has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取實作者會使用這個方法，最多變更監視器的網路本身。Cache implementers use this method to wire themselves up to a change monitor. 如果您建立關聯的其中一個或多個變更監視器快取項目，您傳遞與快取項目來填入的變更監視器屬性的執行個體。If you associate one or more change monitors with the cache item, you pass a instance with a populated change monitors property to the cache item. 支援變更監視器快取實作者負責反覆屬性和註冊委派與每個變更它找到的監視器。A cache implementer that supports change monitors is responsible for iterating over the property and register the delegates with each change monitor that it finds. 因為委派會包含選擇性狀態參數、 具象變更監視器實作可以傳遞選擇性狀態資訊。Because the delegate includes an optional state parameter, a concrete change monitor implementation can pass optional state information. 快取實作者會判斷是否可以採用明確的相依性，做為回呼的一部分傳送的自訂變更監視器狀態的類型。The cache implementer determines whether an explicit dependency on the type of state that a custom change monitor passes as part of the callback can be taken. > [!NOTE] > 基底的快取擴充性 API 有不需要明確的相依性的狀態類型。The base cache extensibility API has no requirement for explicit dependency on the type of state. 實作方法會自動決定是否將監視狀態已變更時方法呼叫。The implementation of the method automatically determines whether the state of the monitor has already changed at the time method is called. 如果屬性是`true`，則方法會自動呼叫事件註冊處理常式，，透過方法。If the property is `true`, then the method automatically calls the event handler, that was registered, through the method. 會發生這種情況是因為您可以從快取實作會建立用來取得監視快取實作，並繫結在一起本身，最多時間的變更監視的時間已變更基礎受監視的狀態。This occurs because it is possible that from the time a cache implementation creates a change monitor, to the time a cache implementation gets the monitor and wires itself up to it, the underlying monitored state has changed. 如果狀態已變更再傳遞給物件方法`null`。If the state has already changed then the object that is passed to the method is `null`. 方法可以叫用一次，並在後續呼叫會擲回例外狀況。The method can be invoked only one time, and will throw an exception on subsequent calls.

span.span: The callback method has already been invoked.
is .

block.para:
1. 您必須呼叫任何相依性變更的通知方法。You must call the method to be notified of any dependency changes.如果已經發生相依性變更，執行個體時將會呼叫呼叫。If a dependency change has already occurred, the instance will be called when is called.否則，執行個體將會呼叫一次，其中一個時方法呼叫或當呼叫方法時，何者先發生。Otherwise, the instance will be called one time, either when the method is called or when the method is called, whichever occurs first.快取實作所提供的執行個體應該移除快取項目並快取呼叫端要求時引發的必要的變更或更新事件，回到原始的快取呼叫端。The instance provided by the cache implementation should remove the cache entry and if it is requested by the cache caller, raise the necessary change or update event back to the original cache caller.
2. 物件快取實作必須移除相依性變更與相關聯的快取項目。The object cache implementation must remove the cache entry that is associated with a dependency change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnChanged(object state) cil managed

span.span: The data for the change event.
This value can be .

summary.span: 在相依性變更時由衍生類別呼叫，以引發事件。

span.span: Called by derived classes to raise the event when a dependency changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，發生相依性變更時，呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called when dependency changes occur. 方法也會叫用時變更監視執行個體已處置，但處置時才會發生在回呼尚未叫用。The method is also invoked when a change-monitor instance is disposed but the disposal occurs only if the callback has not already been invoked. 如果方法之前呼叫呼叫方法時，從呼叫的狀態資料方法儲存的快取實作。If the method is called before the method is called, the state data from the call to the method is saved by the cache implementation. 此外，若要回撥立即叫用方法時叫用方法。Also, the callback to the method is invoked immediately when the method is invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UniqueId As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ UniqueId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示 類別執行個體。

span.span: Gets a value that represents the class instance.

value.span: 變更監控執行個體的識別項。

span.span: The identifier for a change-monitor instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值通常相依名稱結合字串資料組成可唯一識別項的受監視的資料執行個體。The property value typically consists of dependency names combined string data that uniquely identifiers the data that is being monitored by a instance. 值屬性是字串。The value of the property is a string. 字串的值用來指派的唯一識別碼執行個體。The value of the string is used to assign the unique ID of the instance.

para.span: 您可以藉由覆寫屬性，定義屬性的字串值的自訂實作以便將它指派唯一識別碼。

span.span: By overriding the property, you can define a custom implementation for the string value of the property in order to assign it a unique ID.

para.span: 在衍生類別中，您必須在建構函式中設定屬性的值。

span.span: In derived classes, you must set the value of the property in the constructor.
